sentences.cn: 出售自制产品的手艺人

sentences.en: Peddlers cried their wares in the streets.
Peddlers cry their wares in the street.
sentences.cn: 小贩们在街上叫卖他们的货物.

sentences.en: She loves oven - to - table Corning wares.
sentences.cn: 她爱极了烘烤上菜两用的康宁瓷器.

sentences.en: Small boats loaded with wares sped to the great liner as she was entering the harbour.
sentences.cn: 当大型班轮驶进港口时,满载货物的小船纷纷向它飞驶来.

sentences.en: Some were haggling loudly with traders as they hawked their wares.
sentences.cn: 有些人正在大声同兜售货物的商贩讲价钱.

sentences.en: The only admitted test of utility in wares was the finding of buyers for them.
sentences.cn: 判断商品实用价值的唯一被公认的标准是该商品能否找到顾客.

sentences.en: The peddler bawled his wares in the street.
The peddler sold his wares cheap.
The peddler was crying up his wares.
sentences.cn: 小贩极力夸耀自己的货物.

sentences.en: The store displays its wares in the window.
sentences.cn: 商店把各种物品陈列在橱窗内.

sentences.en: The wares in that store are dear.
sentences.cn: 那个商店里的商品价格高.

sentences.en: They sold their wares at half - price.
sentences.cn: 他们的货品是半价出售的.

sentences.en: Vendors displayed their wares in baskets or on the ground.
sentences.cn: 小贩们把他们的商品摆放在篮子里或地上。

sentences.en: Whither went all the tourists and pedlars with strange wares?
sentences.cn: 他们都到哪里去了 呢 ?

sentences.en: You must push your wares if you want better sales.
sentences.cn: 如果你想要销路好,你必须强行推销你的商品.

phrases.tran_cn: 软件；语言设备；设计计算法；程序设备

trans.tran_cn: 货物，商品，商品( ware的名词复数 )，制品，作…用的器皿，…室的物品
trans.tran_en: things that are for sale, usually not in a shop
